definition: a departing gift/a souvenir on leaving/a poem to mark one's departure
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

sentences.english: Sadness swells in melody, farewell turns into song, while love has become the past.
sentences.chinese: 悲傷成調，留別成曲，愛已成隨風往事。
